passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(1) > main:nth-child(3) > div > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(1) > main:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(2) > form > h2:nth-child(4)
html > body > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(1) > main:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(2) > form > h2:nth-child(10)
